snippet.title: My Friend Pedro - Release Date Hype Train
snippet.description:
Available June 20 on Nintendo Switch and PC!

Preorder Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/my-friend-pedro-switch/

Preorder Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/557340/My_Friend_Pedro/

My Friend Pedro is a violent ballet about friendship, imagination, and one man’s struggle to obliterate anyone in his path at the behest of a sentient banana.
